I unfortunately cannot give this game a thumbs up right now. Due to recent patches and updates that I hope they will fix, the game is just not playable (as a survivor) in my honest opinion. This is also one of my favorite games to play too so its just disheartening. First thing is, the hitboxes. Theyre just way too insanely huge. And with the new survivor animation changes, you cant turn around fast. No more 360'ing killers. That was a big thing for alot of players I'd guess, especially for me. Being able to 360 out of a bad situation with no more pallets and unsafe window placements could help or even save me the game or time for other perks to kick in. Or help against face campers/tunnelers, just anything really. But now i feel like a really big thing in the game has been destroyed and I just cannot bring myself to play survivor again until things have changed. When you try to turn around, your character kind of just stands still to do a big turn. In a game where you have to constantly be running from a killer thats alot faster than you, that .5  second stop turn is alot. Dead by daylight just does not feel the same. and Im not saying that the animations arent great, im sure it took a long time to implement into this game, but it just doesnt feel right. Taking a core evading thing out of the game just feels.. unskilled. I feel like you can just give a controller to a 3 year old and they can hit top ranks as long as they just keep holding W into a survivor knowing they cant get out of the way of attacks now. And hitboxes just seem alot worse. I feel like i get hit from so far away now. Im not sure if its just a bug or if its intended but its just too much. The only thing i can props is the smoother skill checks, which should have been implemented a long time ago  like they said they were going to. But anyway. So far the game is a good 4/10 right now.

Edit* So I decided after writing this review a few weeks ago, Id come back with an update
but to my little surprise, there is no update for this game. its still as bad as it was before when i originally made this. I have no idea how people can actually stomach to play this game in its current state, its almost like the DEVs do not listen to anyone that plays their game. Noone asked for UI updates. Noone asked for new player animations that literally break the game beyond playability. Why havent killers gotten reduced lunge range?? or hitbox range? this shit is so unbelievably crazy. The lunge range and hitbox size is what players have been asking for for awhile. Maybe a little perk revisitation or something, update the perks. But the game itself with animations were fine, stop touching up parts of the game that is already decent. FIX ACTUAL STUFF THAT BREAKS THE GAME. Moonwalking isnt a problem, so you change survivor running animation so people cant do it anymore? Why? Who was it hurting? Its so beyond me that 30k people are still playing this game at a time and not rioting about it. Its honestly just so bad in its current state. I love getting hit from 10 feet away because killers just need all the help they can get. But killers cry about DS huh. so you nerf it into the ground because they cant take the fact that they tunnel. And the fact that killers can snowball off of 1 person dying in this game is crazy and still do well. Face campers/tunnelers can just win so easily. This game truly repulses me. 1/10

I'm so tired of these devs making things that were just fine worse. Players keep complaining about balance issues and bugs, and what do devs do? Completely change UI so it's a pain to look at. Change survivors' animations into stiff and unnatural ones. Nerf killers that were totally fine (looking at you, Billy). Guys, stop! If you make changes to your game you make GOOD changes, not the ones that make everything worse! 

Speaking of the game itself, it's only playable with SWF (survive with friends) or on low/middle ranks as a killer. Don't even bother playing solo, it's a nigthmare full of toxicity and frustration. I wish this game changed for good but it's not likely, at least not with these devs.

Look at how many hours I have. If you like slasher flicks, supernatural horror and murderous monsters this is your game. It provides a competitive experience where sometimes the way to win is by leaving someone to die. But other times the only way you can win is to stick your neck out for someone that might not do it for you. If you'd rather be on the other side of the coin you can hop in and play as a remorseless monster bent on exacting pain in the service of the entity. Wonderful game, nothing else compares to the experience. Try it out, worse thing you'll be out is a few bucks if you don't like it, it goes on sale all the time. (Side note it can be glitchy, but they experiment with a lot of mechanics that other games have never tried, so of course blazed trails won't be as pretty as built roads)

Developers have an absurd inability to care about or understand their player base. Developers have been explicitly told countless times of current bugs and refuse to acknowledge these. Instead they insist on pumping out more cosmetics for their cash-grab scheme without so much as an iota of consideration for loyal players.
Don't buy the game. The grind is real bad, and the MMR system is frustratingly simple and lacks any context of skill.

遊戲越改越糟糕，以前至少人跟鬼是平等的，但現在鬼越來越難爬分，在遊玩的時候也常會遇到AT團，如果剛入坑，是新手又想玩鬼但又沒技能，那你準備好被他們BM到死，導致越來越少人想要玩鬼（除非你是M）。
而自爬分機制被改後，人類越來越好爬到紅段，可是真的有實力的少之又少，如果單排，就會變成你在遊戲裡不是4V1而是1V4，你會一直看到你的隊友在做一連串令人窒息的操作，儘管心裡有夠幹，但他就是可以一直刷分數還刷得比做事的人高（比如只救人不修機，明明沒有借來卻故意噌救援分然後雙倒，就是要躲櫃子躲到天荒地老等等），令我開始懷疑自己到底是不是位於紅段區域，還有那些人類是間諜嗎？

總之這次修改的UI真的爛到靠杯，遊戲機制也被改到很靠杯。
最重要的一點，人類隊友也很靠杯。

覺得現在的沒以前來的好玩，對這遊戲很失望也很難過。

Сама по себе игра занятная, но разработчики не прислушиваются к сообществу игроков и делают все по свеому.
Отличный пример - последнее обновление, было очень много недовольства касательно нового интерфейса, куча отзывов на этот счет и не изменили ничего. И такое происходит не только с интерфейсом. 
Помимо этого неприятно ощущается прокачка персонажей\ убийц, что бы открыть нужные перки придется потратить не мало времени. С долгим поиском игр и маленьким количеством очков для выживающиъ это еще сильнее.
